main event: A white light was observed moving slowly and erratically in the sky over Chicago on October 10, 1962.
interesting points: The object was low in the sky and appeared in the west,It disappeared and reappeared during the observation,The witness considered the object to possibly be a satellite, The ECHO 1 satellite was visible over Chicago at that time, The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes.
witness description: B. Stanley, Jr. and son from a hobby observatory
